mapper.update:
update tbl_usr_habbit
memb_id = #{membId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_smoke = #{isSmoke,jdbcType=BIT},
is_drink = #{isDrink,jdbcType=BIT},
sleep_habbit = #{sleepHabbit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_midnight = #{isMidnight,jdbcType=BIT},
is_nap = #{isNap,jdbcType=BIT},
is_eat_well = #{isEatWell,jdbcType=BIT},
eat_description = #{eatDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_move = #{isMove,jdbcType=BIT},
move_description = #{moveDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
characteristic = #{characteristic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
where hab_id = #{habId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
